climbing training meets the internet

far too long have climbers searched aimlessly about the web for training clues, or struggled to read faded handwritten tips from the local gym training guru

now, withcrimpd's finely crafted technology, it's easy to:

find exercisesperfect for climbingbuild a workoutsee friends' workoutsrecord dataview your progress

joincrimpd and the amazing community of climbers worldwide on our journey together to sendage

and, oh yea, it's totally free
